com.redhat.rhn.frontend.servlets
Class PxtCookieManager

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.frontend.servlets.PxtCookieManager

public class PxtCookieManager
extends java.lang.Object

A PxtCookieManager creates, retrieves, and parses pxt cookies. For a general overview of the pxt cookie, see What is the pxt cookie?

This class is thread-safe.

Constructor Detail

PxtCookieManager

public PxtCookieManager()
Method Detail

createPxtCookie

public Cookie createPxtCookie(java.lang.Long pxtSessionId,
                              HttpServletRequest request,
                              int timeout)
Creates a new pxt cookie with the specified session id and timeout.

Parameters:
pxtSessionId - The id of the pxt session for which the cookie is being created.
request - The current request.
timeout - The max age of the cookie in seconds.
Returns:
a new pxt cookie.

getPxtCookie

public Cookie getPxtCookie(HttpServletRequest request)
Retrieves the pxt cookie from the request if one is included in the request.

Parameters:
request - The current request.
Returns:
The pxt cookie included in the request, or null if no cookie is found.

getCookieName

protected java.lang.String getCookieName(HttpServletRequest request)
Determines the pxt cookie name. The name will include the server name from the request if the web.allow_pxt_personalities property in rhn.conf is set.

Parameters:
request - The current request.
Returns:
The pxt cookie name.
